item.title: This Is Not the Saudi Arabia Trump Visited Before
item.description: America’s national security could benefit from a successful Trump visit to Saudi Arabia — and suffer from a bad one.

item.title: The U.S. Army Is Finally Pivoting Toward Future Threats
item.description: A new doctrine will transform the kinds of weapons America uses, how they are purchased and how fast they get into the hands of soldiers.

item.title: RFK Jr. Swims in D.C.’s Rock Creek, Which Flows With Sewage and Bacteria
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr., the health secretary, shared photos of himself and his grandchildren swimming in waters that handle sewer overflow.

item.title: Germany Has a Long History of U.S. Investment. That May Be Changing.
